name: less-index
description: Create an entry point for a directory of LESS files.

scripts.clean:
git reset && echo '/node_modules/' > .gitignore && git add .gitignore && git stash save --include-untracked --keep-index '`npm run clean` trash can' && git clean --force -d && git reset --hard && echo '
clean: Uncommitted and ignored files have been moved to git’s stash. To restore them run `git stash pop --quiet; git checkout .gitignore`.'
scripts.coverage: rm -rf coverage && npm run test:transpile && cd .es5 && istanbul cover test.js && mv coverage ..
scripts.docs:
npm run transpile && echo '[]' | doxie --append "$(./bin/less-index.js --help)
" --inject into Readme.md
scripts.prepublish: npm run --silent clean && npm run transpile
scripts.test:transpile: rm -rf .es5 && babel test.js test/*.js test/*/*.js module/*.js module/bin/*.js module/bin/*/*.js --out-dir .es5; chmod +x .es5/module/bin/*.js; cpy 'test/mock-cwd/a/*' .es5/test/mock-cwd/a
scripts.transpile: cd module; babel --out-dir ../ *.js bin/*.js bin/*/*.js; cd ..; chmod +x bin/*.js
scripts.view-coverage: echo 'Generating coverage reports...'; npm run coverage >/dev/null && echo '...done.' && opn ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html >/dev/null
